description:
Create theme files that map Catppuccin Mocha colors to Shoelace CSS tokens:

1. src/styles/catppuccin.css - Define Catppuccin color variables
2. src/styles/shoelace-theme.css - Map to Shoelace tokens:
   - --sl-color-primary-500: #89b4fa (blue)
   - --sl-color-success-500: #a6e3a1 (green)
   - --sl-color-warning-500: #f9e2af (yellow)
   - --sl-color-danger-500: #f38ba8 (red)
   - --sl-color-neutral-0 through 950: base to text
   - --sl-panel-background-color: var(--mantle)
   - --sl-input-background-color: var(--surface0)

3. Import in main.ts and verify Shoelace components render with dark theme

Test: Add a test sl-button to index.html, verify it renders with Catppuccin colors
